rows.label: tlk70000041_02_msg0001
rows.name:
This warehouse was damaged, too,
but thankfully more than half of the
stuff inside was fine.

rows.label: tlk70000041_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Now, following a decree from the king,
we're getting ready to give out food
and medicines to the whole country.

rows.label: tlk70000041_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm normally a little lazy, but now I'm
all fired up to help save the people!
I just love this country so much. *sniff*
